alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 14 at 10:21PM MST until November 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Post Falls, Fairfield, Airway Heights, South Hill, Rockford, Hayden, Davenport, Cheney, Spokane Valley, Coeur d`Alene, and Worley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility will result in hazardous driving conditions. Near freezing temperatures could also lead to icy conditions, especially on bridge decks and lesser traveled roads.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
